Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpertController
public class Controller extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
The Controller will handle messages from all clients by checking their contents and modifying the model's state according to the commands received

    • verifyActive

      private boolean verifyActive(String nickname)
      Method verifyActive checks if the player is active.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a boolean - true if the player is active, false otherwise.

    • phaseChecker

      private boolean phaseChecker(PHASE correctPhase, String nickname)
      Method phaseChecker checks if the message match with the phase.
      Parameters:
      correctPhase - PHASE - the phase where the message is sent.
      nickname - String - the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      a boolean - true if the phase is correct, false otherwise.
